logicalTable.name: F0 Revenue Base Measures
logicalTable.description:
This logical table contains metrics like Revenue, Billed Qty, with different types of aggregations like Sum, Count Distinct and logical calculations.
This logical table is at the order level grain but is sourced from 3 alternate Logical Table Sources : one detail source at the order grain level, one aggregate source at the product-month grain, and one at the product-office-month grain. BIEE server will automatically go to the most appropriate source based on the level included in each user query.

logicalColumns.name: Revenue
logicalColumns.description: Returns the Revenue from the Revenue Facts table with a Sum aggregation

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.F10 Revenue Facts (Order grain).Revenue
physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.F11 Revenue Facts Aggregate.Revenue

logicalColumns.name: Billed Quantity
logicalColumns.description: Returns the Billed Quantity from the Revenue Facts table with a Sum aggregation

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.F10 Revenue Facts (Order grain).Units
physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.F11 Revenue Facts Aggregate.Units

logicalColumns.name: Discount Amount
logicalColumns.description: Returns the Discount Amount from the Revenue Facts table with a Sum aggregation

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.F10 Revenue Facts (Order grain).Discnt_Value
physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.F11 Revenue Facts Aggregate.Discnt_Value

logicalColumns.name: # of Offices with Orders
logicalColumns.description: This metric counts the distinct number of orders in the query population. The aggregation is a Count Distinct aggregation

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.F10 Revenue Facts (Order grain).Office_Key

logicalColumns.name: # of Orders
logicalColumns.description: This metric counts the distinct number of orders in the query population. The aggregation is a Count Distinct aggregation

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.F10 Revenue Facts (Order grain).Order_Number

logicalColumns.name: # of Products with Orders
logicalColumns.description: This metric counts the distinct number of Products in the query population. The aggregation is a Count Distinct aggregation

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.F10 Revenue Facts (Order grain).Prod_Key
physicalColumn:Sample App Lite Data.F11 Revenue Facts Aggregate.Prod_Key

logicalColumns.name: Actual Unit Price
logicalColumns.description: This logical object calculates the Actua Unit Price by dividing Revenue by Units.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Revenue
logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Billed Quantity

logicalColumns.name: Target Unit Price
logicalColumns.description: This logical object calculates the Target Unit Price by dividing Target Revenue by Target Units.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F1 Targets Base Measures.Target Revenue
logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F1 Targets Base Measures.Target Quantity

logicalColumns.name: Avg Order Size
logicalColumns.description: This logical object calculates the Actual Average Oder Size by dividing Total Revenue by number of Distinct Orders.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Revenue
logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.# of Orders

logicalColumns.name: Target Completion  (Rev Pct)
logicalColumns.description: Calculates the completion percentage by dividing Actual revenue by Target Revenue. The result is then multiplied by 100.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Revenue
logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F1 Targets Base Measures.Target Revenue

logicalColumns.name: ---------- Dynamic Time Level ---------------------
logicalColumns.description: Header object, dummy not to be used in any queries

logicalColumns.name: Period Ago Revenue
logicalColumns.description: Shows the period Ago Revenue. This calculation is dependent on the time grain that is set in the query by the user. If day object is in the query, then this metric will return Day Ago, if month then month ago...

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Revenue

logicalColumns.name: Revenue Variation to Last Period
logicalColumns.description: Shows the variation between current period and period Ago Revenu. This calculation is dependent on the time grain that is set in the query by the user. If day object is in the query, then this metric will return variation to Day Ago, if month then variation to month ago...

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Revenue
logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Period Ago Revenue

logicalColumns.name: Revenue Pct Var. to Last Period
logicalColumns.description: Shows the percentage variation between current period and period Ago Revenue. This calculation is dependent on the time grain that is set in the query by the user. If day object is in the query, then this metric will return variation to Day Ago, if month then variation to month ago...

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Revenue Variation to Last Period
logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Period Ago Revenue

logicalColumns.name: Trailing 3 Periods Revenue
logicalColumns.description: Shows the sum of current period plus 2 past Ago Revenue. This calculation is dependent on the time grain that is set in the query by the user. If day object is in the query, then this metric will return trailing 3 Days, if month then trailing 3 months...

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Revenue

logicalColumns.name: ---------- Fixed Time Level ---------------------------
logicalColumns.description: Header object, dummy not to be used in any queries

logicalColumns.name: Month Ago Revenue
logicalColumns.description: Shows the Month Ago Revenue. This calculation is not dependent on the query time grain and will always return the value as of month ago.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Revenue
logicalLevel:SampleApp Lite.D0 Time.Month

logicalColumns.name: Quarter Ago Revenue
logicalColumns.description: Shows the Quarter Ago Revenue. This calculation is not dependent on the query time grain and will always return the value as of Quarter ago.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Revenue
logicalLevel:SampleApp Lite.D0 Time.Quarter

logicalColumns.name: Year Ago Revenue
logicalColumns.description: Shows the Year Ago Revenue. This calculation is not dependent on the query time grain and will always return the value as of Year ago.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Revenue
logicalLevel:SampleApp Lite.D0 Time.Year

logicalColumns.name: Quarter to Date Revenue
logicalColumns.description: Shows the Quarter to date sum of Revenue. This calculation is not dependent on the query time grain.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Revenue
logicalLevel:SampleApp Lite.D0 Time.Quarter

logicalColumns.name: ----------- Level Based Measures -----------------
logicalColumns.description: Header object, dummy not to be used in any queries

logicalColumns.description: Shows the full month sum of revenue.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Revenue

logicalColumns.name: Full Quarter Revenue
logicalColumns.description: Shows the full quarter sum of revenue.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Revenue

logicalColumns.name: All Offices Revenue
logicalColumns.description: Shows the sum of revenue for all offices.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Revenue

logicalColumns.name: All Products Revenue
logicalColumns.description: Shows the sum of revenue for all products.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Revenue
